properties.entry: SELECT /* $reportUser.userName */ /*+label($!reportMetadata.environment$$!reportMetadata.reportType$$!reportMetadata.reportName)*/ f.adnet_id AS adSourceId ,d.name AS adSource ,SUM(f.revenue) AS totalRevenue ,SUM(f.revenue_gross) AS grossRevenue ,SUM(f.revenue_net) AS netRevenue ,SUM(f.revenue_gross) - SUM(f.revenue_net) AS costOfSales ,SUM(f.ads_requested_adnet) AS adRequests ,SUM(f.ads_served) AS adServed ,SUM(f.ads_clicked) AS adClicks ,SUM(f.ads_delivered) AS adDelivered FROM fact_revenue_adnet_vw_daily f INNER JOIN dim_adnet d ON d.id = f.adnet_id WHERE (f.tag_monetization = 1 OR f.tag_monetization = 0 AND f.revenue > 0) AND f.start >= :start AND f.start < :stop GROUP BY f.adnet_id, d.name
